txt.en: In the red flicker of Wisewood's eyes, you see rage and grief at the burning of several members of his grove.\n\nOrcs start fires, but they do not put them out. You should ensure that all of the Orc-fires have been adequately snuffed out, lest they endanger the remainder of Wisewood's grove.
You were unable to save Wisewood's burned trees, but you were kind enough to stop the spread of the Orc-fires.\n\nWisewood will be grateful for your goodness on his behalf.
Orcs have burned a number of trees around their encampment. The fires should be put out before they spread.
Orc-fires can be found around the Orc-encampment near Wisewood.\n\nYou should stamp out any Orc-fires you can find.
You have snuffed out several Orc-fires on Wisewood's behalf, saving what is left of his ravaged grove.
